casebody.data:
J.L., ON BEHALF OF minor child, A.L., Petitioner,
v.
BOARD OF EDUCATION OF the BRIDGEWATER-RARITAN REGIONAL SCHOOL DISTRICT, SOMERSET COUNTY, Respondent. C-669 September Term 2018
082071 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 8, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-002022-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
